representative_example.name: representative_example
representative_example.label: Generic Representative Example
representative_example.description: values: custom_text, searched_amount, searched_period, max_loan_period, loan_fee, loan_fee_flat, loan_fee_percentage, min_interest_rate, max_interest_rate, total_cost_min, total_cost_max, total_cost_custom, company_name Operators: Group: (), -,+, /, *,
representative_example.default_value: Borrow: [rep_example value="searched_amount"].   Maximum loan period: [rep_example value="max_loan_period"]. Loan fees: [rep_example value="loan_fee"].  Annual interest rate: [rep_example value="min_interest_rate" zerovalue="show"] [rep_example before="-" value="max_interest_rate"]  . Effective rate: [rep_example value="effective_rate_min"] - [rep_example value="effective_rate_max"]. Total cost ranging from: [rep_example value="total_cost_min"] to [rep_example value="total_cost_max"]. Total Cost Custom: [rep_example value="total_cost_custom"]. Company name: [rep_example value="company_name"]. Custom rate: [rep_example value="custom_interest_rate"] Monthly payment test: [rep_example formula="(searched_amount+total_cost_min)/searched_period"] Searched period: [rep_example value="searched_period "]. Effective Rate Custom: [rep_example value="effective_rate_custom"]
